author: henning
msg: Removed debug statement which causes huge amounts of data to be logged
for each screen if running in debug mode.

author: henning
msg: - Clean up a few more hardcoded values and constants in the DynamicURI class.
- Pull the changes from rev 1.4 (reference support) and post-1.8 into
RelativeDynamicURI. add an assertInitialized() to the toString() method

author: quintonm
msg: - Fixed defect in getScriptName() where the serverName was being returned by mistake.
- Fixed defect in both toString() methods causing the contextPath not to be included in the URL.
Thanks to Bart Selders [bart.selders@ibanx.nl] for reporting the problem.

author: henning
msg: Ignore all velocity.log files, and for those in the audience that
test Turbine under Eclipse, ignore the meta files from eclipse.
